about.story.title: Our story
about.story.desc1: UFeed was born from the heart of the Arab African world, with a mission to transform the Human Capital domain. We are unique in that we integrate technology while leveraging 30 years of mastery through
about.story.desc3: UFeed is the spark that turns decades of consulting wisdom into accessible, AI-powered tools, crafted by regional experts for a global stage. Our platform is fully enabled in both Arabic and English, ensuring that we cater to the diverse needs of our users.
about.story.desc4: Our journey is fueled by a powerful purpose: to break down the barriers of traditional consulting and democratize human capital excellence. We empower every organization—from startups to giant corporation—with tools once reserved for the elite, as well enabling consulting businesses to address their clients' needs seamlessly and efficiently by adopting our platform. We focus on building internal capacity for our clients, tapping into the untapped knowledge base vertical in Human Capital to support data-driven decision-making.
about.story.desc5: With UFeed, organizations can establish industry benchmarks and norms, guided by well-defined tools and data analytics that ensure success and cost efficiency for both our clients and their customers. Coming from the region, we understand how to serve our local market using global expertise infused with local flavor. UFeed is committed to harnessing cutting-edge technology, paving the way toward a fully AI/ML-powered model that enhances the future of human capital management.
about.journey.tagline: Built for the region, ready for the world — UFeed empowers organizations with bilingual, AI-driven tools to manage and grow their human capital with clarity, equity, and speed.
about.journey.bilingual_desc: Arabic & English interface designed for native fluency.
about.journey.equal_access_desc: Premium HR tools made affordable and scalable.

about.team.ceo_message.title: Message from the CEO
about.team.ceo_message.body: Technology enablement has become a crucial tool for organizations worldwide, boosting their growth and success. Inspired by this trend and driven by a sincere belief in equitable access, I envisioned UFeed a cutting edge corporate startup at the forefront of technology driven enablement. Our aim is to collaborate with various stakeholders to introduce a well structured, advanced, and cost efficient platform that harnesses the power of data, digitalization, AI and ML. UFeed aims to bridge the gap between premium consulting tools and knowledge accessibility within organizations, empowering individuals with the right tools at an affordable price. Our name, UFeed, carries a meaningful essence. In Arabic, it signifies the benefit and value we bring, while in English, it represents the quantity of data we feed into the system. As we accumulate more data points, our stakeholders leverage better outcomes and enhance their decision making processes. Originating from the vibrant Egyptian Arab African horizon, we aspire to expand our valuable insights to the global stage. UFeed operates as a comprehensive, cycle based platform where you feed it with information and data, and in return, it provides you with knowledge and analytics. The cycle persists by continually expanding inputs and data, leveraging technology, ML, and AI to continually improve outcomes. We understand the wealth of data available to businesses and strive to provide actionable insights that drive data driven decision making.
about.team.ceo_message.thank_you: Thank you for being a part of our journey.

digitalizing.intro_prefix: UFeed, a corporate startup, has emerged as the digital arm of
digitalizing.intro_suffix: with a mission to transform their extensive know how into cutting edge technology. With a clear objective to digitalize and automate methodologies for the future, UFeed is leveraging years of expertise, extensive data, and deep knowledge accumulated by
digitalizing.body: By harnessing this wealth of information, UFeed aims to revolutionize the industry by creating innovative solutions that streamline processes and enhance efficiency.
digitalizing.foundation_prefix: Building on the solid foundation of
digitalizing.foundation_suffix: experience, UFeed is at the forefront of the digital transformation wave. The company recognizes the immense potential in utilizing advanced technologies to drive organizational growth and elevate industry standards. By combining the power of automation with the wealth of knowledge accumulated over the years our mission is to empower businesses to make data driven decisions. With a strong commitment to innovation and a deep understanding of the industry, UFeed will be transforming
digitalizing.conclusion: know how into cutting edge technology that will shape the future of the digital consulting.
ees.page.title: Employee Engagement Survey
ees.page.desc: Our engagement survey platform is designed to gauge employee satisfaction and motivation effectively. It provides insights to enhance productivity and retain top talent, while also allowing for customizable questions and detailed reporting.
ees.benefits.enhanced_understanding_desc: Gain deep insights into employee satisfaction, motivation, and engagement levels through our comprehensive surveys.
ees.benefits.strategic_improvement_desc: Develop targeted strategies to boost productivity and retain top talent,track progress, and make informed, data driven decisions.
ees.benefits.flexible_demographics_desc: Benefit from our platform's flexibility in displaying, demographics and comprehensive multiple choice questions, tailored to your needs.
ees.features.bilingual_desc: UFeed EES platform offers a bilingual interface in Arabic and English, enhancing user experience and ensuring clear communication.
ees.features.expert_tool_desc: Crafted by top HR professionals, this tool streamlines data collection with expert insights, ensuring efficiency and accuracy.
ees.features.instant_access_desc: HR professionals can quickly create engagement surveys with just a few clicks, ensuring timely feedback collection.
ees.features.diverse_surveys_desc: UFeed EES platform offers various survey types, from comprehensive questionnaires to quick pulse surveys, tailored to your needs.
ees.features.custom_demographics_desc: Easily customize demographics to fit your organization’s unique employee classifications, enhancing result analysis.
ees.features.progress_dashboard_desc: Track survey progress in real time with our dashboard, ensuring your surveys remain on track for success.
ees.features.custom_analytics_desc: Tailor your analytics reports to focus on the demographics and topics that matter most to your business.
ees.features.benchmark_desc: Establish benchmark capabilities by analyzing internal data-point’s year-over-year and building external benchmarks through comparisons with broader market references, which creates a comprehensive view of performance, fostering efficiency enhancements across the organization.
ees.features.smart_insights_desc: Leverage AI to uncover market norms by analyzing engagement survey data, identifying the highest and lowest ranked topics, equipping users with actionable recommendations tailored to enhance engagement results, ensuring organizations remain competitive and aligned with industry benchmarks.

hero.description: At UFeed, we specialize in transforming human capital management, providing superior data analytics and insights to elevate your organization's potential with UFeed.
innovation.title_main: your team with UFeed's cutting edge
innovation.feature.holistic_desc: UFeed is powering the HC industry with limitless solutions through access to knowledge of well-structured methodologies and tools and data analytics utilization.
innovation.feature.user_friendly_desc: Solutions are built to be easily accessible and user-friendly, so users can access UFeed solutions with ease.
innovation.feature.custom_access_desc: Empowers customizing interface for each client based on their needs to validate who has which access level to do what!
innovation.feature.self_service_desc: Leveraging over 30 years of expertise, we empower organizations by equipping them with the skills to independently implement and maximize the benefits of our solutions.
innovation.feature.ai_enabled_title: AI-enabled with the power of data
innovation.feature.ai_enabled_desc: By harnessing the power of vast datasets and advanced AI algorithms, organizations can gain unprecedented insights, optimize processes, and make informed decisions with remarkable precision.
innovation.feature.cost_affordability_de: Compared to other competitors in the HC domain, UFeed represents a very affordable cost vs value.
jet.page.description_prefix: JET is an automated job grading model that helps assess job significance consistently, ensuring equity. Job evaluation is crucial for growth, affecting compensation for companies and employees. Using
jet.page.description_suffix: methodology, organizations can leverage JET to improve evaluations.
jet.section.structured_desc: Allows evaluators to assess job significance in a structured, objective, and consistent manner and it ensures internal equity.
jet.section.enhanced_growth_desc: Crucial for organizational growth, influencing the essential compensation framework for both the company and its employees.
jet.section.expertise_suffix: methodology, harnessing vast knowledge and proficiency in reward management
jet.section.improved_eval_desc: The JET transforms grading by simplifying assessments and ensuring fairness, leading to better outcomes.
jet.features.bilingual_desc: UFeed JET platform features a bilingual interface in arabic and english, ensuring effective communication and user engagement.
jet.features.automated_ja_desc: JET revolutionizes data collection with its automated tool, streamlining the validation process from job holders to direct manager and finally HR.
jet.features.custom_access_desc: JET offers customizable access rights, allowing users to manage and consolidate data across various company levels.
jet.features.consistent_eval_desc: The automated tool ensures a consistent evaluation process, reducing errors and enhancing control over the process for all users, guiding them through each step easily.
jet.features.alert_notifications_desc: JET provides alert notifications for borderline evaluations, helping to identify potential conflicts in grading related to position hierarchy, which ensures clarity and consistency in the evaluation process.
jet.features.comparative_position_desc: JET allows users to compare different positions across departments, companies or subsidiaries to ensure logical evaluations and consistency in data, facilitating informed decision making.
jet.features.international_grading_desc: Create correlations between JET grades and global grading systems for ease of reference and use.
jet.features.real_time_reporting_title: Real time reporting with salaries bands
jet.features.real_time_reporting_desc: Generate comprehensive grading reports instantly after evaluations, including guided salary bands (Applicable for Egypt Market).
jet.features.intelligent_eval_desc: Harness the power of AI and machine learning to conduct advanced analyses of job data points based on company size and type. This innovative capability generates trends for position levels and grades, empowering users to make data driven decisions that align with market standards and enhance job evaluation processes.

workperf.item1.title: Lack of data-driven insights
workperf.item1.desc: Making informed decisions is challenging without access to accurate and actionable data, leading to inefficiencies and missed opportunities.
workperf.item2.title: Need for customized solutions
workperf.item2.desc: Organizations need tailored applications to address unique challenges effectively, using standardized approaches.
workperf.item3.title: Low employee engagement
workperf.item3.desc: Keeping employees motivated and satisfied is crucial for productivity, yet many organizations struggle to engage their workforce effectively.
workperf.item4.title: Ineffective job role evaluations
workperf.item4.desc: Fair and transparent job evaluations are essential for aligning roles with business goals and maintaining competitive pay to attract, retain, and ensure employee satisfaction.
